Welcome to Microbe’s documentation!¶

Microbe is a Micro Blog Engine written in Python, inspired by Pelican and powered by Flask.

It has been developed following the Kiss principles. No data base is required for the application.

Write your contents using Markdown format.

Installation¶

$ pip install microbe

Features¶

  • Blog posts and static pages
  • Comments
  • Theming support
  • Atom feeds
  • Code syntax hilighting
  • Search
  • Multi users
  • Files upload
  • Multi language support (English and French)

Technologies used¶

  • Python
  • The Flask Python Web Framework
  • Flask-Flatpages extension
  • Flask-CodeMirror extension
  • Flask-Paginate extension
  • Flask-Themes2 extension
  • Flask-WTF extension
  • Pagedown Converter
  • Whoosh
  • Markdown editor inspired from excellent lepture editor
  • jQuery
  • CherryPy
  • VizHash.js
  • Foundation CSS framework
